name: The Battle of R'lyeh
description:
The Nazi Army discovered the localization of the mysterious city of R’lyeh in the old pages of a mysterious book found in the Egypt. With the war tension and the pressure of his borders, Admiral Sven Schultz II has a mission given directly by the Führer to go to the coordinates in the South Pacific and find a mysterious power never discovered that can change the course of war.

Dive in R’lyeh on a Tower Defense where your goal is protect the city of the nazi invasion and keep your Lord’s health, Cthulhu! He’s still powerless and need rest, so don’t let any nazi hand touch him!!
